description: From private to private. Call us and visit this house. Welcome to the rural world! Located in Cubas de la Sagra, just 35 minutes from the capital, this property is located in a quiet municipality full of La Mancha charm. With a total area of 3,355 m2, this urban land is perfect for those looking for a life away from the hustle and bustle of the city. The house, built on one floor, has 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, living room, kitchen, toilet and a full bathroom. In addition, it has an entrance porch, a 12x6 square meter pool and a 15 meter warehouse. The property is surrounded by different fruit trees, which makes it even more attractive. Cubas de la Sagra is a town that has extensive history and architectural treasures, as well as a nursery school and two public bilingual preschool and primary schools. It also has the bilingual Secondary School "IES Sor Juana de la Cruz", which makes it ideal for families with children. The property has access by road and public transport, with the A-42 highway from Madrid and Toledo, the M-404 highway from Serranillos del Valle, Batres, El Álamo, Batres, Navalcarnero and A-5 to the west, and Griñón, Torrejón de la Calzada, Torrejón de Velasco, Chinchón and the A-3 and A-4 highways to the east. There are also buses available, such as line 460 Madrid (Plaza Elíptica) - Parla - Batres, line 468 Getafe - Griñón / Casarrubuelos / Serranillos, and line 468 Fuenlabrada-Griñón-Serranillos-Cubas de la Sagra-Casarrubuelos. Don't miss the opportunity to live in this beautiful property! Book your visit today and start enjoying a life away from the stress of the city.
